page.title: 06 THORLEY SHOPPING AREA
page.content: This planned development was completed in spring,1984.It is situated between the main through roads of the Thorley estate,Villiers-sur-Marne & Friedburg Avenues.The site was developed for the Sainsbury Co. which owns all the shops. The hypermarket has a sales area of 18,200 square feet,including a bakery, delicatessen & off-licence.A free car-park has spaces for 340 cars & a perol station.Next to the main shop is a row of smaller ones occupied by a hairdresser,newsagent,travel agent, video rentals,computer firm & a doctor's surgery.Sainsbury's wanted some of these buildings as a fozen food store,but the local council refused permission.A public house,the Marne Inn,serves hot & cold meals.
